CatDescriptText: Dr. Roy T. Anderson, dentist, 2015 Centre Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1958, pg. 6 with question: "Do you believe the trouble in Middle East will start an atomic world war?" answer reads: "The Middle East trouble could be the beginning of an atomic world war. It is not impossible."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Dr. Roy T. Anderson wearing dentist coat and standing in office with window with blinds that reads "Dr. AND..."
